nodes.text: Grinko was a Weequay pirate who served as the first mate in the pirate gang led by Scorza. Grinko was present on Scorza's skiff when the gang attempted to find the supposed treasure aboard the wrecked Separatist cruiser Obrexta III, during which Scorza ordered Grinko to fire their skiff's cannons at the Shrike, the sail barge of the rival crew of Sidon Ithano. During the skirmish, a geyser of lava erupted from the desert, setting fire to the Weequay gang's skiff.
